Const, ConstFont
public class Font extends org.jsfml.graphics.Font
Holds a character font for use in text displays.

    • getGlyph

      public Glyph getGlyph(int unicode, int characterSize, boolean bold)
      Description copied from interface: ConstFont
      Gets a glyph information structure from the font.
      Parameters:
      unicode - the unicode (UTF-32) of the character to retrieve the glyph for
      characterSize - the character size in question
      bold - true if the bold glyph version should be returned, false for the regular version
      Returns:
      the Glyph representing the given unicode character

    • getKerning

      public int getKerning(int first, int second, int characterSize)
      Description copied from interface: ConstFont
      Gets the kerning offset between two glyphs.
      Parameters:
      first - the unicode (UTF-32) of the first character
      second - the unicode (UTF-32) of the second character
      characterSize - the character size in question
      Returns:
      the kerning offset between the two glyphs

    • getTexture

      public ConstTexture getTexture(int characterSize)
      Description copied from interface: ConstFont
      Retrieves the texture containing the font's glyphs. The texture returned is immutable.
      Parameters:
      characterSize - the character size in question
      Returns:
      the texture containing the font's glyphs of the character given size
